h2_title: Yaoguai Chief Miniboss Fight - Apramana Bat
content: Now that the bat is gone, return to the skull of the Serpent General and interact with it. You'll then see Turtle General look over and mourn his fallen friend, causing a giant glowing green tear to fall.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Bitter_Lake_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Bitter Lake Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Yaoguai Chief Miniboss Fight - Apramana Bat'.
The content is as follows:
Now that the bat is gone, return to the skull of the Serpent General and interact with it. You'll then see Turtle General look over and mourn his fallen friend, causing a giant glowing green tear to fall.
